items.title: New hosts for Chagas disease vectors identified
items.summary: Solitary weasel-like animals called tayra might look pretty harmless, but some may actually be incubators for a parasite that causes Chagas disease, a chronic, debilitating condition that is spread by insects called kissing bugs and affects more than 8 million people worldwide.

alternate.title: New hosts for Chagas disease vectors identified

thumbnail.title: New hosts for Chagas disease vectors identified

items.title: Novel strategy for chirality controlled synthesis of single-walled carbon nanotubes
items.summary: Researchers have developed a novel strategy for controlling chirality of single-walled carbon nanotubes.

alternate.title: Novel strategy for chirality controlled synthesis of single-walled carbon nanotubes

thumbnail.title: Novel strategy for chirality controlled synthesis of single-walled carbon nanotubes

items.title: An interconnection between the nervous and immune system
items.summary: Researchers have shown that the increased incidence of infections seen in spinal cord injury patients is directly linked to a disruption of the normal central nervous system.

alternate.title: An interconnection between the nervous and immune system

thumbnail.title: An interconnection between the nervous and immune system

items.title: Guidelines for handling CAR T cell side effects
items.summary: Immune-cell based therapies opening a new frontier for cancer treatment carry unique, potentially lethal side effects that provide a new challenge for oncologists, one addressed by proposed guidelines for systematically dealing with the toxicities of these drugs.

alternate.title: Guidelines for handling CAR T cell side effects

items.title: Cell model of the brain provides new knowledge on developmental disease
items.summary: By reprogramming skin cells into nerve cells, researchers are creating cell models of the human brain. In a new study, the researchers describe how cells from patients with the severe developmental disease lissencephaly differ from healthy cells. The method can provide vital new knowledge on difficult-to-study congenital diseases.

alternate.title: Cell model of the brain provides new knowledge on developmental disease

thumbnail.title: Cell model of the brain provides new knowledge on developmental disease

items.title: Molecular motors: Slowing the clockwork
items.summary: Progress on the way to smart nanomachines: Chemists have modified the synthesis of a molecular motor so as to reduce the speed of its light-driven rotation, thus permitting the researchers to analyze the mechanism of motion in complete detail.

items.title: Local epileptic seizure shows long distance interaction
items.summary: An epileptic seizure may be highly local, but it also influences brain activity at a distance of over ten centimeters from the core. This, in turn, affects the active area, scientists report.

alternate.title: Local epileptic seizure shows long distance interaction

thumbnail.title: Local epileptic seizure shows long distance interaction

items.title: Ricin only lethal in combination with sugar
items.summary: Researchers have discovered a means of immunizing cells against the biological weapon ricin, which, they report, is only lethal when combined with sugar.

alternate.title: Ricin only lethal in combination with sugar

thumbnail.title: Ricin only lethal in combination with sugar

items.title: 'Language of stem cells' discovered
items.summary: Stem cells control the cells around them, inducing them to perform specific functions. This phenomenon of the "language of stem cells", which has now been discovered for the very first time, report investigators.

items.title: Owners of seriously ill pets at risk of stress, anxiety and depressive symptoms
items.summary: Owners of seriously or terminally ill pets are more likely to suffer with stress and symptoms of depression and anxiety, as well as poorer quality of life, compared with owners of healthy animals, finds a study.

alternate.title: Owners of seriously ill pets at risk of stress, anxiety and depressive symptoms

items.title: Toy gun popular with kids can cause serious eye injury, warn doctors
items.summary: A toy gun that is popular with children can cause serious eye injuries, warn doctors in a new article.

alternate.title: Toy gun popular with kids can cause serious eye injury, warn doctors

items.title: New lung cell type discovered
items.summary: A new lung cell type that is implicated in the body's innate immune defense against the bacteria Streptococcus pneumoniae -- one of the leading causes of pneumonia worldwide -- has been discovered by researchers.
